title: Greater Albion's Latest Discount Offers
content: Greater Albion Typefounders have just released discount offers on our two latest faces, Svengali Roman and Chiara Script, when purchased through [Myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023420/http:/new.myfonts.com/foundry/Greater_Albion_Typefounders/). An article giving more details has been posted on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023420/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).
author: Rasendyll
